name: Space Rocks by Julian
description:
A fun retro-inspired game built with help from FriendlyCosmonaut's YouTube series. Very small download of only 21MB, takes just a few seconds. 

BLAST THROUGH ASTEROIDS IN SPACE

Controls: 

UP/DOWN (move player)

LEFT/RIGHT (change direction)

SPACEBAR (shoot)

W,A,S,D keys can also be used move the player if you'd prefer.

How to win:

10 points per asteroid hit, 1000 points to win the game.

How to lose:

Collide with an asteroid 3 times.

Hidden easter egg in-game:

Wonder what it could be??? 

=^..^=
